message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you were thinking of $9000, but I'm not quite comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10000. Would you be willing to consider $10500?

I understand you're still a bit above $10000, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table. I'm counteroffering at $12000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $10250. Can you consider that?

I understand you're trying to meet me in the middle, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $11500. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but $11500 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer, so I'll go a bit lower. I'm thinking of $10750. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going below $12000. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $12250. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.

I'm afraid we've reached an impasse, Alice. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to a mutually agreeable price. I'll make one final offer: $10000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
